name: VR Dinosaur City War
description:
Dinosaurs escape from human captivity and face human tank attacks in the city. Players control dinosaurs to fight back against human tanks;

Players will get points for destroying tanks. If the points are satisfied, they will get a state of 100% body size enlargement. This state is immune to damage and lasts for 10 seconds. Players can complete the level by destroying the specified number of tanks within the specified time.


Instructions:
Kill 60 tanks to win
Steering: left handle up/down/left/right
Movement: Right handle left/right
Attack: Right handle trigger button
Menu: handle menu key
